channel.title: How do I add Random PVP Drops on Delta [317]
channel.description:
Ok here is my question:
How do i make it so that when you kill someone, depending on how much wealth you have on you, it will randomize drop? Like runescape PvP. And like Godz Gamerz PvP v2. But I want to be able to do this without downloading a new source.
AND Please don't say "Use the search button" because I have. Found nothing suitable for my question.
Help pl0x ~3m0

item.title: How do I add Random PVP Drops on Delta [317]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

A good server with this idea would be Special-Pkz PvP. You can find it in the download section.

Read full topic
